class\u003d\"brz-tp-lg-paragraph brz-text-lg-center\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-dufwd\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"ixinb\"\u003e\u003cspan class\u003d\"brz-cp-color6\"\u003eJesus is central to everything we do. We sing, pray, and preach in His powerful Name. Our past, present, and future is centered on Jesus Christ. Our purpose on this earth is to make much of Jesus Christ.\u0026nbsp;Colossians 1:16-17 says (when speaking of Jesus), “For by him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or rulers or authorities—all things were created through him and for him. And he is before all things, and in him all things hold together.”\u0026nbsp;We commit that our church is dedicated to loving this all-powerful, all-loving God with everything we have, and we invite you to join us in this desire.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp class\u003d\"brz-tp-lg-paragraph brz-text-lg-center\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-rpzsk\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"pbdum\"\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e"}}],"_id":"jawsmzkvcsilypptlzwxmdhrvgpagsxmjxsq","mobileMarginType":"grouped","mobileMargin":0,"tempMobileMargin":0,"mobileMarginSuffix":"px","tempMobileMarginSuffix":"px","mobileMarginTop":0,"tempMobileMarginTop":0,"mobileMarginTopSuffix":"px","tempMobileMarginTopSuffix":"px","mobileMarginRight":0,"tempMobileMarginRight":0,"mobileMarginRightSuffix":"px","tempMobileMarginRightSuffix":"px","mobileMarginBottom":0,"tempMobileMarginBottom":0,"mobileMarginBottomSuffix":"px","tempMobileMarginBottomSuffix":"px","mobileMarginLeft":0,"tempMobileMarginLeft":0,"mobileMarginLeftSuffix":"px","tempMobileMarginLeftSuffix":"px"}}],"_id":"debnssbfkvzanmwvpqysscetbxjjnsjhoqvy","bgColorType":"solid","tempBgColorType":"solid","bgColorHex":"#000000","bgColorOpacity":1,"tempBgColorOpacity":1,"bgColorPalette":"color3","tempBgColorPalette":"","gradientColorHex":"#009900","gradientColorOpacity":1,"tempGradientColorOpacity":1,"gradientColorPalette":"","tempGradientColorPalette":"","gradientType":"linear","gradientStartPointer":0,"gradientFinishPointer":100,"gradientActivePointer":"startPointer","gradientLinearDegree":90,"gradientRadialDegree":90,"tabsState":"normal","paddingType":"ungrouped","paddingBottom":115,"paddingTop":115,"mobilePaddingType":"ungrouped","mobilePaddingBottom":70}}],"_id":"gghcbeiszbjzkhdayrtbakrgowshtgirxehu","_thumbnailSrc":13987345,"_thumbnailWidth":600,"_thumbnailHeight":194,"_thumbnailTime":1682548193656},"blockId":"Kit2Blank000Light"}

blocks.right-media:
{"type":"Section","value":{"_styles":["section"],"items":[{"type":"SectionItem","value":{"_styles":["section-item"],"items":[{"type":"Row","value":{"_styles":["row","hide-row-borders","padding-0"],"items":[{"type":"Column","value":{"_styles":["column"],"items":[{"type":"Wrapper","value":{"_styles":["wrapper","wrapper--richText"],"items":[{"type":"RichText","value":{"_styles":["richText"],"_id":"iwxnkgxymvrtvxluqwilmrmtoyjiwniivmpm","text":"

PASTORAL COUNSELING

"}}],"_id":"jhbxlmhkpcdbnfoywqasjycggdylhmttxffy"}},{"type":"Wrapper","value":{"_styles":["wrapper","wrapper--richText"],"items":[{"type":"RichText","value":{"_styles":["richText"],"_id":"gnlxiwsutotwqahsicgnhrowtmudytgpsjmt","text":"

Our goals in Pastoral Counseling are to guide and help individuals discover Christ-centered answers to a wide range of personal, relational, financial or other challenges. We have trained counselors and pastors who facilitate a free service for individuals seeking guidance for a variety of issues including marital and family relationships, communication and intimacy, parenting, grief and loss, anger and bitterness, inner personal struggles, and spiritual discouragement. Our volunteers receive extensive training, ongoing supervision, and continuing education. 


If you are someone who could benefit from counseling, you're not alone! We have hundreds from our congregation who have (and still) meet with our counselors monthly and weekly. If you would like to schedule an appointment or just have some questions answered, please reach out.

class\u003d\"brz-tp-lg-paragraph brz-text-lg-left\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"tqhix\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-bntpr\"\u003e\u003cspan class\u003d\"brz-cp-color6\"\u003eThe beautiful story of Bloom is comprised completely in the unique make-up of the individuals who call Bloom their home. class\u003d\"brz-text-lg-left brz-tp-lg-paragraph\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-oxuui\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"msxis\"\u003e\u003cspan class\u003d\"brz-cp-color6\"\u003eWelcome! It is a real joy for us to meet newcomers and to tell you about all the good things God is doing in our church family. For over ten years now it has been our mission to love God with everything.\u0026nbsp;That means that no matter where you have come from and where you are on your spiritual journey, we want to come alongside to inspire, equip and encourage you to live out a life that will bring glory to God and be a blessing to the world.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp class\u003d\"brz-text-lg-left brz-tp-lg-paragraph\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-oxuui\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"msxis\"\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp class\u003d\"brz-text-lg-left brz-tp-lg-paragraph\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-oxuui\" data-uniq-id\u003d\"msxis\"\u003e\u003cspan class\u003d\"brz-cp-color6\"\u003eHere\u0027s all you need to know before you show up for your first Sunday morning gathering:\u0026nbsp;Come as you are.\u0026nbsp;Although our time will be taken up by singing, teaching and praying, you don\u0027t need any manual to figure out how to fit in. Jesus simply says: \"Come to me\"\u0026nbsp;and we say the same. Just come as you are!\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp class\u003d\"brz-tp-lg-paragraph brz-text-lg-center\" data-generated-css\u003d\"brz-css-vtguh\"
